00032 void RainbruRPG::Options::OptionManager::init(){
00033   LOGI("Initializing OptionManager");
00034   this->damage=false;
00035   options=new Options();
00036 }

00045 void RainbruRPG::Options::OptionManager::add(OptionPanel* op){

00073   options->~Options();

00091 RainbruRPG::Options::OptionPanel* 
00092 RainbruRPG::Options::OptionManager::getPanelByName(const char* n){
00093 
00094   OptionPanel* ret=NULL;
00095 
00096   tOptionPanelList::const_iterator iter;
00097 
00098   // Iterate through list and output each element.
00099   for (iter=panelList.begin(); iter != panelList.end(); iter++){
00100     const char*name=(*iter)->getCaption();
00101 
00102     if (strcmp(name, n)==0)
00103       ret=(*iter);
00104 
00105   }
00106 
00107   return ret;
00108 
00109 }

00125 RainbruRPG::Options::OptionButton* 
00126 RainbruRPG::Options::OptionManager::getButtonByName(const char* p, 
00127                                                     const char* b){
00128 
00129 
00130   OptionButton* ret=NULL;
00131 
00132   OptionPanel* panel=getPanelByName(p);
00133 
00134   if (panel){
00135     ret=panel->getButtonByName(b);
00136   }
00137   else{
00138     LOGW("Cannot get the OptionPanel");
00139   }
00140 
00141   return ret;
00142 }
00143 
00151 void RainbruRPG::Options::OptionManager::update(){
00152   tOptionPanelList::const_iterator iter;
00153 
00154   // Iterate through list and output each element.
00155   for (iter=panelList.begin(); iter != panelList.end(); iter++){
00156     (*iter)->update();
00157   }
00158 }

00205 void RainbruRPG::Options::OptionManager::saveCurrentSnapshot(const char* c){

00215 void RainbruRPG::Options::OptionManager::loadSnapshot(const char* c){
00216   LOGI("Loading snapshot :");
00217   LOGCATS("Snapshot name :");
00218   LOGCATS(c);
00219   LOGCAT();
00220 
00221 
00222   xmlOptions o;
00223   o.loadSnapshot( c, &panelList);
00224   update();
00225 }
